coffee_data.name: Espresso Shot
coffee_data.instructions: Brew a shot of espresso and enjoy!
coffee_data.description: A classic Italian coffee that's simple, strong and perfect for a quick pick-me-up.

coffee_data.name: Cappuccino
coffee_data.ingredients: 1 shot of espresso, 1 cup of milk, 1 tbsp sugar
coffee_data.instructions: Brew a shot of espresso, heat the milk and sugar in a pan until it starts to steam, froth the milk and pour it over the espresso.
coffee_data.description: A delicious and creamy Italian coffee that's perfect for a lazy morning or afternoon treat.

coffee_data.name: Vanilla Latte
coffee_data.ingredients: 1 shot of espresso, 1 cup of milk, 1 tbsp vanilla syrup
coffee_data.instructions: Brew a shot of espresso, heat the milk and vanilla syrup in a pan until it starts to steam, froth the milk and pour it over the espresso.
coffee_data.description: A sweet and creamy coffee that's perfect for anyone with a sweet tooth. The vanilla flavor adds a delicious twist to the classic latte.

coffee_data.name: Americano
coffee_data.instructions: Brew a shot of espresso and pour it into a cup, add hot water and enjoy.
coffee_data.description: A simple coffee that's perfect for anyone who loves the taste of espresso but wants a milder flavor. The hot water dilutes the espresso, creating a smooth and delicious coffee.

coffee_data.name: Mocha
coffee_data.ingredients: 1 shot of espresso, 1 cup of milk, 1 tbsp cocoa powder, 1 tbsp sugar
coffee_data.instructions: Brew a shot of espresso, heat the milk, cocoa powder and sugar in a pan until it starts to steam, froth the milk and pour it over the espresso.
coffee_data.description: A decadent and indulgent coffee that's perfect for anyone who loves chocolate. The rich and creamy mocha is the perfect treat for a cold winter's day.
